pages.text: Like many mods, IC2 Classic has a few wide-reaching ideas.$(br2)$(bold)Energy Units (EU)$()$(br)IC2C is a tech-based mod, and like many tech-based mods it uses an energy system. This system is known as EU. EU is transmitted from Generators, through Cables, to Storage blocks and Machines, in packets. These packets have a given size (EU/p; Voltage), and each machine has a maximum
size of packet it can absorb which determines its tier.

The Macerator GUI contains 7 slots and 2 indicators. The upper-left and center-right slots are input and output slots. The lower-left slot can hold an RE-Battery to power the machine. The lightning bolt symbol is a charge indicator, showing how much EU the Macerator contains. The right four slots are Upgrade slots. The Macerator can accept Machine Upgrades and Inventory Upgrades.

The Macerator has a more Advanced MV version, the Rotary Macerator.$(br2)$(bold)Power Data$()$(br)Tier: LV$(br)Max Input: 32 EU/t$(br)Energy Storage: 800 EU$(br)Energy Consumption: 2 EU/t$(br)Work Time: 300 Ticks/operation
